text:
Place for a quick salad. Ordered a small bowl and a chamomile apple drink. Get membership for discounts and accumulate points. Paid via visa paywave.

Small sit down area with tables and chairs shared with Kopifellas

Very positive first experience buying from this place. I'm not exactly a grains bowl kind of guy, but boy, this place really does it very well in terms of value pricing, portion and taste of food. Though I recall that prices have went up for the Mini, hope the Gain and Regular will remain the same as a major selling point of this eatery is their price to value ratio! Selection of ingredients are excellent with a wide range of variety. Enjoyed my first bowl with them very much!
I love grain! One of my favourite places to get a quick and yummy meal:) there’s also a place for you to sit and enjoy the meal! Staff are really very helpful too:)
Tasty and quality ingredient bowl. Was highly recommended by Keith whos a big fan - filling portion even with the mini bowl. Recommend the hummous

i loved this place so much! the selection was great, and it’s great for protein. the price was also reasonable for how much food it was. food was fresh, and chicken breast wasn’t dry and very well seasoned. nice seating areas too. i really recommend you to try this place out, or any other grains & co chain stores!
